description:
The more Badges & XP you collect, the more chances of winning Free NFT's, discount, early access.

AYA nature is very buzzy. We are in the end stage of releasing our 1rst NFT. SOON we will be handing out our 1rst edition of 'The Gold Clover Collection'. This NFT is 4 FREE! (2Mi transaction fee).

More FREE editions will follow. If you get them all at a certain point in time you will receive a very special reward. A REAL version of this coin.

You get this badge when you retweet: https://twitter.com/AYANatureNews/status/1510738022094057472

Infinite Love,
AYA Nature
name: AYA ~Buzzy Bees Badge~ (Reward ends soon)
